q: Santonio Holmes on a spectacular pass to the corner of the end zone with just 35 seconds remaining." I think that it really is why[ Ben Roethlisberger ] is a great player," Troy Aikman said. Because at the end of the day, when it's all said and done, regardless of where your numbers may or may not be, it's about if you can win the game when the game's on the line, and he's done it on the biggest stage. While Troy Aikman has been impressed by both Aaron Rodgers and Ben Roethlisberger this season, he gave credit to another standout quarterback, the Eagles' Michael Vick ." All I can tell you is that as far as my reporters are concerned the instructions were very clear: they were to work within the law and within the PCC code. It's in their handbooks.
